title: Million Dollar Sports Cards with Khalil Randell
itunes:title: Million Dollar Sports Cards with Khalil Randell
description:
For beginner card collectors to football fanatics, there’s plenty of opportunities to begin capitalizing on your love of sports and all the knowledge that comes with it by making some long-term investments.

Khalil is the author of Million Dollar Sports Cards: A Golden Guide to Sports Card Collecting and Investing. He collected cards growing up, but eventually lost his entire collection when his childhood home was foreclosed on. It wasn’t until Khalil was working to put himself through grad school and won a lot of cards from his local Goodwill that he reinvigorated his love for the hobby and decided to start turning profits. 

On this episode of Underdog Empowerment, Zach and Khalil dive deep into the tactics around buying and selling cards in line with how those players are performing day-to-day. They also connect over their favorite athletes and how that influences the cards they are looking for. Listen in for an episode that will take you from hobbyist to entrepreneur. 

Show Notes: https://underdogempowerment.com/khalil-randell
 
Get More Involved: 
 
  1. Leave A Review & Subscribe On iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/underdog-empowerment/id1373572178
  2. Free A-to-Z roadmap on launching a top-shelf podcast: https://underdogempowerment.com/roadmap
  3. Access Our Top Resource Recommendations: https://underdogempowerment.com/resources/
  4. Subscribe On YouTube: https://underdogempowerment.com/youtube
